channel.title: XML Historical Foreign Exchange Rates for Indonesian Rupiah (IDR) (5 Apr 2017)
channel.description: XML historical foreign exchange rates for Indonesian Rupiah (IDR) from the Float Rates. Published at 5 Apr 2017.
